errors.error_description: An unnecessary dependency, `pandas`, is listed in the 'Other dependencies' section.
correction_candidates: Remove `pandas` from the list of dependencies.
Change `pandas` to `scipy` in the list of dependencies.
errors.golden_answer: Remove `pandas` from the list of dependencies.

errors.error_description: The command to install the development version uses the incorrect flag `--dev` instead of `--pre`.
The Windows installation command specifies `torch===1.5.0`, which conflicts with the library's requirement of `torch >= 1.6`.
The command to format code points to a non-existent script path `./scripts/format.sh` instead of the correct `./format_code.sh`.
The code formatting instructions incorrectly advise running the format script `./format_code.sh` before installing the necessary tools (`black`, `isort`).
correction_candidates: Combine the commands into a single line: `pip install black isort && ./format_code.sh`.
Swap the order of the two commands, so `pip install black isort` is executed first.
Remove the `./format_code.sh` script and instruct users to run `black .` and `isort .` directly.
errors.golden_answer: Swap the order of the two commands, so `pip install black isort` is executed first.
